name: WAIKIKI BEACH COCONUT
Description: A breezy blend of tropical white coconut, saltwater breezes and sun-bleached woods that takes you to the shores of one of the world's most beautiful beaches

name: BAHAMAS PASSIONFRUIT & BANANA FLOWER
Description: A fruity blend of passionfruit, pineapple leaves and banana flower for island hopping where the beaches are stunning and the waters are crystal clear.

name: HIBISCUS PARADISE
Description: Let pink hibiscus, juicy guava and coconut take you to your personal tropical oasis.

name: KEY WEST COCONUT WATER & MELON
Description: Relax with this fresh blend of coconut water, saltwater waves and fresh melon and take in the breathtaking sunset of a summer night in the Florida Keys.
